<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/41fe061753923986e6676424132960d970bb2a76|patch 8.2.0341: using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error>
patch 8.2.0341: using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error

Problem:    Using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error.
Solution:   Pass the LET_NO_COMMAND flag. (closes #5715)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0341: using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error · vim/vim@41fe061
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0341: using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error · vim/vim@41fe061
attachments.text: Problem: Using ":for" in Vim9 script gives an error. Solution: Pass the LET_NO_COMMAND flag. (closes #5715)

patch 8.2.0343: Vim9: using wrong instruction, limited test coverage

Problem:    Vim9: using wrong instruction, limited test coverage.
Solution:   Use ISN_PUSHJOB.  Add a few more tests.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ab55c6826f9080477fea6d5593f0b77931acfc1d|patch 8.2.0344: ":def" not skipped properly>
patch 8.2.0344: ":def" not skipped properly

Problem:    ":def" not skipped properly.
Solution:   Add CMD_def to list of commands the require evaluation even when
            not being executed.

attachments.text: Problem: ":def" not skipped properly. Solution: Add CMD_def to list of commands the require evaluation even when not being executed.
